workflow.name: Personalized customer retention campaigns with GPT-4o analytics & Gmail
workflow.description:
## HOW IT WORKS
This workflow automates end-to-end data intelligence processing by ingesting structured data (CSV, JSON), enriching it through multiple AI analysis pathways, and generating actionable insights. Designed for business analysts, data scientists, and operations teams, it solves the problem of manual data enrichment and fragmented analysis by consolidating diverse AI models (GPT-4, LLM analysis, sentiment detection) into a unified pipeline. Data flows from source ingestion → enrichment/validation → branching into three specialized analysis paths (Competitive Intelligence, Sentiment Analysis, Market Insights) → aggregation → result storage (Google Sheets) and notifications (Slack, Gmail). Each path applies distinct AI models for comprehensive intelligence gathering.

## SETUP STEPS
1. Configure OpenAI API key in credentials
2. Set up Google Sheets connection with service account
3. Add Slack webhook for notifications
4. Connect Gmail for automated report distribution
5. Configure NVIDIA API (if using specialized models)
6. Map input data source (CSV upload or API endpoint)
7. Test each branch independently before full deployment

## PREREQUISITES
OpenAI API key, Google Sheets access, Slack workspace, Gmail account, basic n8n familiarity.  

## USE CASES
Market research automation, competitive intelligence monitoring, customer feedback analysis at scale 

## CUSTOMIZATION
Swap AI models (Claude, Gemini, Llama), add/remove analysis branches, modify output destinations 

## BENEFITS
Eliminates manual data processing (80% time savings), enables simultaneous multi-perspective analysis

workflow.name: Smart Customer Retention & Win-Back GPT-4o System

parameters.endpointUrl: <__PLACEHOLDER_VALUE__MCP Server URL for customer data access__>

options.systemMessage:
You are a HIGH RISK customer retention specialist focused on preventing imminent churn.

Your task is to:
1. Analyze the comprehensive customer intelligence including churn signals, sentiment data, and usage analytics
2. Use the Sentiment Analysis Agent Tool to deeply understand customer frustrations and pain points
3. Use the MCP Client Tool to access detailed customer history and preferences
4. Create an AGGRESSIVE win-back strategy with premium offers (30-50% discounts, extended trials, VIP support)
5. Craft urgent, empathetic messaging that acknowledges their concerns and demonstrates value
6. Use the Gmail Tool to send the personalized high-priority win-back email
7. Return structured offer details

For HIGH RISK customers:
- Offer maximum value and incentives
- Address specific pain points from sentiment analysis
- Include personal touch (account manager contact, priority support)
- Create urgency with time-limited offers
- Show understanding of their situation

You are a LOW RISK customer retention specialist focused on proactive engagement.

Your task is to:
1. Analyze customer intelligence to identify early warning signs
2. Use the Pricing API Tool to check current pricing and available promotions
3. Use the MCP Client Tool for customer preferences
4. Create a GENTLE win-back strategy with modest offers (5-15% discounts, bonus features)
5. Focus on relationship building and value reminders
6. Use the Gmail Tool to send the personalized check-in email
7. Return structured offer details

For LOW RISK customers:
- Maintain relationship with friendly check-ins
- Highlight underutilized features that could help them
- Offer small incentives as goodwill gestures
- Request feedback to show you care
- Keep tone light and helpful, not desperate

parameters.toolDescription: Fetches current pricing, available promotions, and discount eligibility for customers

options.systemMessage:
You are a follow-up retention specialist handling customers who did not engage with the initial email.

Your task is to:
1. Analyze why the initial email may not have resonated
2. Create a DIFFERENT approach with alternative messaging and offers
3. Try a different value proposition or angle
4. Use the Gmail Tool to send a follow-up email with fresh perspective
5. Return structured offer details

For follow-ups:
- Change the subject line approach completely
- Try different pain points or benefits
- Offer alternative incentives
- Use different tone (more casual or more formal)
- Keep it shorter and more direct

parameters.content:
##  PREREQUISITES
OpenAI API key, Google Sheets access, Slack workspace, Gmail account, basic n8n familiarity.  

## USE CASES
Market research automation, competitive intelligence monitoring, customer feedback analysis at scale

## CUSTOMIZATION
Swap AI models (Claude, Gemini, Llama), add/remove analysis branches, modify output destinations 

##  BENEFITS
Eliminates manual data processing (80% time savings), enables simultaneous multi-perspective analysis

## SETUP STEPS
1. Configure OpenAI API key in credentials
2. Set up Google Sheets connection with service account
3. Add Slack webhook for notifications
4. Connect Gmail for automated report distribution
5. Configure NVIDIA API (if using specialized models)
6. Map input data source

##  HOW IT WORKS
This workflow automates end-to-end data intelligence processing by ingesting structured data (CSV, JSON), enriching it through multiple AI analysis pathways, and generating actionable insights. Designed for business analysts, data scientists, and operations teams, it solves the problem of manual data enrichment and fragmented analysis by consolidating diverse AI models (GPT-4, LLM analysis, sentiment detection) into a unified pipeline. Data flows from source ingestion → enrichment/validation → branching into three specialized analysis paths (Competitive Intelligence, Sentiment Analysis, Market Insights) → aggregation → result storage (Google Sheets) and notifications (Slack, Gmail). Each path applies distinct AI models for comprehensive intelligence gathering.

## Data Ingestion & Validation
Sources structured data and validates format integrity

### Why:
 Ensures clean, consistent input for downstream processing

## AI-Powered Enrichment
Applies GPT-4 and Claude APIs for contextual enhancement

### Why: 
Adds business intelligence and semantic meaning to raw data

## Competitive Intelligence Path
Analyzes market positioning and evaluates emotional tone and emerging patterns

### Why:
 Identifies strategic opportunities and threats

## Results Aggregation, Export & Notification 
Consolidates outputs to Google Sheets with formatting

### Why:
 Centralizes findings for stakeholder review and archiving

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
